pullRequest.title: Fixing LGTM Issues
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR is to fix a significant portion of our current LGTM issues in MekHQ, and I did some other quick IDE-recommended fixes along the way.

commit.message: Fixing type mismatch between Integer and ForceAlignment
Fixing implicit casts of double to int
Fixing instances of boxed variables never being null

nodes.bodyText: Would this break if placed in a try (...) { with resources block instead?
Put a break; here for good measure.

Suggested change

commit c6a217f
Author: Carl Spain neoancient@megamek.org
Date:   Thu Jan 18 22:19:18 2018 -0600
File in data/universe that lists custom SPAs/edge triggers/implants.
This file is parsed when PersonnelOption is initialized and added to the
list of options before it is locked.

commit 2790cb5
Author: Dylan Myers Dylan-M@users.noreply.github.com
Date:   Fri Dec 19 10:52:44 2014 +0000

Major refactor of CampaignGUI phase 2
Split out:
OrgTreeMouseAdapter
PartsTableMouseAdapter
ServicedUnitsTableMouseAdapter
All of the areAllXXX and doAllXXX check methods into a new mekhq.gui.utils.StaticChecks class,
and made them all static

$ git log --diff-filter=A -- MekHQ/src/mekhq/module/ScriptPluginManager.java
commit e568f25 (origin/plugin)
Author: Carl Spain neoancient@megamek.org
Date:   Sun Jun 17 22:07:36 2018 -0500
Added support for plugins requiring a script engine.
The JRE includes support for JavaScript. Users can add support for other
languages by adding the engine jar to the plugin directory, where it
will be dynamically loaded as a service. The engine is selected based on
the script's file extension.

commit.message: Changing a try catch to a try(resources) catch
Changing try{} catch to try(resources){}catch statements
